paper_metadata.title: Hereditary Transthyretin-Related Amyloidosis Ongoing Observational Study: A Baseline Report of the First 3167 Participants
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

functional_data.summary: The p.Val50Met variant is the most frequently reported variant in TTR.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and family history.
variants.additional_notes: The study identified 17 unique heterozygous TTR variants.
key_quotes: We identified 92 participants with hATTR (3%), exhibiting 17 unique heterozygous TTR variants.
The p.Val50Met variant was the most frequent.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was reported in the paper.
